subject: Curious!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
There's boxes out there that reportedly don't work for the users, and yet 
they don't send the box to the one person that would know the most about at 
least fixing the electronics. I can be grumpy, but I give freely.  I'm 
curious about what is behind this very apparent lack of trust.

Frank-S
